titleInfo.title: Representations of Algebras. Proceedings of the Third International Conference on Representations of Algebras, held in Puebla, Mexico, August 4 - 8, 1980

bibliographicCitation.bio1:
Bongartz K, Ringel CM (1981)
Representation-finite tree algebras.
In: Representations of Algebras. Proceedings of the Third International Conference on Representations of Algebras, held in Puebla, Mexico, August 4 - 8, 1980. Auslander M, Lluis E (Eds); Lecture Notes in Mathematics, 903. Berlin, Heidelberg: Springer: 39-54.
